home.description:
Frontend Developer with experience in creating scalable web applications as well as extending and modifying their modules.
I am constantly striving to improve my skills and actively follow the latest technological trends. I am proficient in Angular, HTML5, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript/TypeScript and Git. I am passionate about developing intuitive and functional applications that meet user needs and introduce innovative solutions.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description: Flexible, motivated, and passionate about creating innovative solutions for clients. Key strengths include cooperation and problem-solving abilities. Always ready to take on new projects and eager to develop them further.

list.item-1: A powerful client-side framework for building single-page applications (SPA) with dynamic content and rich user interfaces. Advanced knowledge of Angular 14+ with experience in component-driven development and performance optimization.
list.item-2: Core languages for modern web development. Proficient in TypeScript for scalable applications and JavaScript for dynamic behavior. Experienced with RxJS and NgRx for reactive programming and state management, as well as seamless integration with REST APIs for frontend-backend communication.
list.item-3: The standard markup language for structuring web content, offering semantic elements, multimedia integration and compatibility with modern web technologies.
list.item-4: Expertise in creating responsive and visually appealing layouts using CSS and SCSS. Skilled in leveraging Tailwind CSS, Angular Material and the BEM methodology to build maintainable and scalable UI components.
list.item-5: Proficient in version control using Git for collaborative development and efficient code management. Hands-on experience with GitHub/GitLab and CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment and continuous integration.
list.item-6: Expertise in designing web interfaces that adapt fluidly to various screen sizes and devices, ensuring optimal user experience across desktops tablets, and smartphones.
list.item-7: Experience with industry-standard UI/UX design tools for creating intuitive user interfaces and interactive prototypes, supporting collaborative and iterative design workflows.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Most recent work
portfolio.description: My websites offer a wide range of advanced features to enhance the user experience. Here are some of the key functionalities:

content-list.description-1: Forms that adapt in real-time to user inputs for a smoother experience.
content-list.description-2: Tables with sorting, filtering, and search capabilities to help users find information quickly.
content-list.description-3: Text inputs, select dropdowns, and autocomplete fields. Comprehensive booking options for seamless reservations.
content-list.description-4: Optimized for all screen sizes to provide a consistent experience across devices.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Get in touch
contact.accept: I accept the terms and conditions of the site.
